title: HEZHEN 7 Pieces Kitchen Knife Set with Block,67 Layers Damascus Steel Chef Knife Set, Knife Block Set for Chefs and Home Cooking
features: [Compelete Knife Set] Featuring a chef knife, santoku knife, bread knife, utility knife, paring knife, kitchen scissors, and a stylish wooden knife block, this comprehensive set is designed to meet all your culinary needs, making it suitable for both home cooks and professional chefs

[Premium Damascus Steel] Crafted from 67 layers of high-quality Damascus steel with a 10Cr15CoMoV steel core, these knives boast a hardness of 60-62 HRC for exceptional durability and sharpness; The intricate Damascus pattern not only enhances their strength but also adds a touch of elegance to your kitchen

[Ergonomic Handle design] Each knife in the set features a beautifully designed handle made from figured sycamore wood with mosaic brass rivets; The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable and secure grip, while the classic aesthetic adds a sophisticated touch to your kitchen tools

[Craftsmanship] Experience razor-sharp precision with a 15°±1 cutting edge angle per side, achieved through meticulous hand-forging and hand-polishing processes; These knives are designed to deliver effortless cutting performance, whether you're slicing, dicing, or chopping

[Ideal Present Box] Presented in an elegant gift box,this kitchen knife set is suitable for any occasion, from weddings to housewarmings; It’s an ideal gift for cooking enthusiasts or a luxurious addition to your own kitchen
description: Product Description Customized Damascus Steel The steel is the real Damascus Steel not laser. It is made of 67 layers of composite forging. We select material 10Cr15CoMoV as steel core: For Cr, it makes the knife more anti-rust and abrasion-resistant. For Co, it improves the heat resistance and wear resistance of steel. For Mo, it keeps sharp and durable. For V, it increases the wear resistance and toughness. The premium steels usually contain element "V" to make the edge sharp. Ergonomic Handle Made by high quality figured sycamore wood. The figured sycamore wood is a special variety of European maple with shadow. Because the shadows maple is rare, it is more special and precious as high-grade wood species. The mosaic brass rivet designed at the end of the handle make it more elegant and unique. Razor Sharp Blade The core hardness is stable at 60-62HRC after vacuum heat treatment that is as the core process of knife making, which can make the core hardness more higher, sharpness and durability more better. Using wet manual cutting edge with a golden angle 15°on each side, it keeps a better balance of sharpness and durability. After professional 12 procedures, it shows the charming natural pattern on the blade. Because of its ultra-sharp double edge, it it suitable for both of left and right hands. About Multifunctional kitchen scissors Durable: made of 3Cr14 stainless steel Removable: more easy to be cleaned Multifunctional: used for poultry, seafood, vegetables, or open the nut,can,beer and so on About Knife Block * Made of black walnut that is one of the premium wood in high hardness. It is very absorbent to prevent deformation although under the damp environment. The delicate texture make it more elegant. * Designed with 6 grooves(suitable for chef knife ,santoku knife or nakiri knife, utility knife, paring knife, kitchen scissors and sharpening rod) About Product Care 1.HEZHEN knives are very sharp, please do not test the hardness of the blade by hand. 2.HEZHEN knives are not suitable for cutting frozen food, because this will make the blade dull. 3.HEZHEN knives are recommended to be washed by hand, not dishwasher cleaning. 4. Pease wash them by with water and mild soap, then wipe them with a soft cloth and let them dry. 5.The handle is made of pure natural solid wood, please do not wash the handle with hot water. Exquisite Gift Box * Packed in exquisite gift box * Suitable for gift-giving and self-use * Equipped with detailed instruction manual and product qualification certificate Package Included 8.3'' Chef Knife *1 8.3‘’ Bread Knife *1 7" Santoku Knife *1 5'' Utility Knife *1 3.5'' Paring Knife *1 Walnut Wood 6-Slot Knife Holder *1 3Cr14 Stainless Steel Kitchen Scissors *1 Damascus Steel knife Set 5PCS Damascus Steel Hammered knife Set 5PCS 67 layers Damascus Steel knife Set 7PCS 73 layers Damascus Steel Hammered knife Set 7PCS Add To Basket Add To Basket Buying Options Buying Options Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 258 4.4 out of 5 stars 59 4.5 out of 5 stars 258 4.4 out of 5 stars 59 Price £319.99 £ 319 . 99 £399.99 £ 399 . 99 — no data — no data Size 5PCS 5PCS 7PCS 7PCS Blade Material 67 layers Damascus Steel 73 layers Damascus Powder Steel 67 layers Damascus Steel 73 layers Damascus Powder Steel Handle Material Figured Sycamore Wood Rosewood Figured Sycamore Wood Rosewood Knife Block Material X X Walnut Wood Walnut Wood Core Hardness 60-62HRC 62-64HRC 60-62HRC 62-64HRC Steel Core 10Cr15CoMoV 14Cr14MoVNb 10Cr15CoMoV 14Cr14MoVNb HEZHEN Brand We specialize in high-end Damascus steel kitchen knives. "HEZHEN" can be divided into "HE" and "ZHEN". "HE" means peace, harmony and friendliness in China. "ZHEN" means excellence. As we continuously study the design concepts of kitchen knives from all over the world, we based on creating perfect products for chefs, advocating the concept of fashion, practice, safety, and health, which is widely recognized by most customers.
